Jugaadâ€¦.a term I had heard of but didnâ€™t understand its magnitude until I arrived in India. Weâ€™ve been living in India for 4 months now, and I can't believe how much I've grown to love this country! The people have been extremely warm and welcoming, and I've learned so much from their diverse perspectives. What really stands out is their resilience and resourcefulness. They've taught me to embrace chaos and find beauty in unexpected places. I am even more grateful to be part of the new technical hub in Pune #bptsi where Iâ€™ll have a chance to work with the countryâ€™s ambitious talent. To top it off - the natural beauty is breathtaking - weâ€™ve been enjoying the local sites - from the Dagusheth Ganesh temple to the hill station of Mahabeleswar to the beaches of Goa - we are fully soaking in everything this rich culture has to offer. #India #bptsi #jugaad #LivingInIndia #CultureShock #Foodie #NatureLover #Resilience
